page.title: 17'Trees'
page.content: Portsmouth trees are being attacked by{Brown Tail Moth caterpillars: "In 1984 they came And sure enough Returned again. Thousands of them - Dark and brown and furry, With light brown stripes. They lurked in trees And fell like leaves. They came to rest On man and beast; Their touch of poison on the skin Produced a blister rash Which pains and mars. Be sure to check Your cat or dog, For in their fur You may well find A little brown caterpillar With{doom}in mind." -S.Long,P.Steel:Portsmouth High School
